General.Name: Automotive Finco Corp
General.Description: Automotive Finco Corp., a specialty finance company, focuses on the auto retail sector in Canada and internationally. The company provides long term and debt-based acquisition financing to auto dealerships. It also focuses on direct investments in the auto retail sector. The company was formerly known as Augyva Mining Resources Inc. and changed its name to Automotive Finco Corp. in March 2017. Automotive Finco Corp. was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 222 Bay Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5K 1E7
